Cocokind Revitalizing Eye Cream

Brand: Cocokind

Category: Around Eye Cream

Ingredients: water, caprylic/capric triglyceride, glycerin, cetearyl alcohol, glyceryl stearates, cetearyl olivate, leuconostoc/ radish root ferment filtrate, sorbitan olivate, potassium cetyl phosphate, sclerocarya birrea seed oil, tetradecane, butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter, albizia julibrissin bark extract, darutoside, hibiscus sabdariffa

filtrate, sorbitan olivate, potassium cetyl phosphate, sclerocarya birrea seed oil, tetradecane, butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter, albizia julibrissin bark extract, darutoside, hibiscus sabdariffa flower extract*, avena sativa (oat) kernel extract, xanthan gum, potassium sorbate, sodium dehydroacetate
Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer
